title: All eight Supreme Court judges stand in solidarity against Trump Scotts Beck?
subtitle: The Supreme Court judges did not write a "letter" saying that President Trump "is totally wrong to choose Neil Gorsosh" to fill a vacancy in court.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: All eight Supreme Court judges wrote a "letter" saying that President Trump was "a complete mistake in choosing Neil Gorsosh" to fill a vacancy in court.
